publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2# Sarah Boyack: Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage—That the Parliament notes the decision by the Scottish Executive to relocate the headquarters of Scottish Natural Heritage (SNH) from Edinburgh to Inverness; acknowledges the campaigning work of the Public and Commercial Services Union to highlight the effect of this proposed relocation for SNH employees; believes that the operational effectiveness of SNH should be paramount in any decision to relocate SNH, and therefore considers that the Executive should reconsider the decision to relocate SNH to Inverness. Supported by: Susan Deacon*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Mike Pringle*, Jeremy Purvis*, Mrs Margaret Smith*, Bristow Muldoon*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Elaine Smith*

S2M-2# Sarah Boyack: Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage—That the Parliament notes the decision by the Scottish Executive to relocate the headquarters of Scottish Natural Heritage (SNH) from Edinburgh to Inverness; acknowledges the campaigning work of the Public and Commercial Services Union to highlight the effect of this proposed relocation for SNH employees; believes that the operational effectiveness of SNH should be paramount in any decision to relocate SNH, and therefore considers that the Executive should reconsider the decision to relocate SNH to Inverness. Supported by: Susan Deacon, Mike Pringle, Jeremy Purvis, Mrs Margaret Smith, Bristow Muldoon, Mr John Home Robertson, Elaine Smith
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Robin Harper*, Margo MacDonald*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Chris Ballance*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Helen Eadie*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) David McLetchie*
S2M-2# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 7 May 2003) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
